description: A digest video that recaps the contents of the first half of TV anime Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari in 5 minutes.

titles.title: 5-fun de Wakaru! Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari
You can see it in 5 minutes! The first cour of the TV anime "The Rising of the Shield Hero"
５分でわかる！TVアニメ『盾の勇者の成り上がり』第１クール
